Text.Page: Where has Dakuryon gone with the Argon Priest?

You set off for the Desolarus Testing Grounds to find Dakuryon.
Upon arrival, you discovered that Desolarus had been argonized by Dakuryon and Armen. You defeated the argonized Desolarus.
This is allow us to teleport to Dakuryon's hideout.

Dakuryon carried out an experiment and transformed Desolarus into an argon.

I will catch that sick Durion and make him pay for that.

He might have gotten away from me again this time, but I won't make any mistakes next time.

But first we have to take care of Desolarus.

Are you ready?

The invasion of the argons has started again.

Do you know what their target is?"Possibly the Spring of Arun?"

Yes, I suspect that too.

The Spring of Arun has divine power.

With it, they could do whatever they wanted.

I hope my suspicion is wrong, but I fear that the argons want to use that power to bring Manahan to Arborea.

The Spring of Arun must be their next target. "Together we can prevent that."

Yes! If the Spring of Arun were controlled by the argons... I don't even want to think what would happen then.

Only with your help can we defeat them.

Come with us, ! "We can do it together for sure!"
